column4: hi everyone, when I first got my USB HDD I made an image of the local disk using the 'dd' command, the speeds were then around 20mb/s. Now, I can't get it over 10mb/s, what can I do to increase the speeds?
I also benchmarked the speeds by copying USB HDD contents to /dev/zero
...and copying the local content to /dev/zero
both had appropriate speeds (the first, around 30mb/s and the latter was around 75mb/s)
